          **1.To get [  caseId   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( ComplianSeer ):
          /cases/get-list
          (**e.g.**"id": 718, "client_id": 0, "title": "TestCase-oAYtD")
          
          **2.To get [  reason_id   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Rules & MDM ):
          /alerts/get-user-processor-programs
          (**e.g.**  "id": 15788, "name": "adjmoa")
          
          **3.To get [  assign_user_id   ] and [  escalate_id  ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ):
          /userDetails/users
          (**e.g.**   "first_name": "Read Write", "id": 2046 )
          
          **4.To get [  priority   ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( Admin & Billing ):
          /codes/get-list-by-type
          (**e.g.**   "key": "2", "value": "Low" )
          
          
        </div>
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
